text: Hi Katie, saw this too late :disappointed: sorry have been busier than expected the past few days on nights and evenings.

I still think Mondays are the best day to do our chat though. I am working on finishing up the concepts for the main asset I will be working on so I will send some pictures of that when I am done along with the backstory and see what you think. Thanks for your patience! I will work on getting my schedule sorted properly to get our chats going
Hope you have a nice week!

Hey Sam - no problem, I did think with it being Bank Holiday you may have been offline! I hope you have been able to enjoy some time off outside of working! :sun_with_face:
Unfortunately I can't do next Monday 3rd June, so let me know when else can work for you and we can arrange something. So sorry about this!
Going back to when we first spoke - I hope you have had some time to think about the goals you want to meet or the things you would like to learn through the mentorship programme?

You were saying previously that you were hoping to explore art styles, update your portfolio and aim to work in the games industry or possibly VFX, I'd love to know what your thoughts are about this or how they may have changed as you have been learning on your course? :art:

In preparation for our chat next week I think it would be great if you can show me a list of how I can make the most out of being a mentor to you and help you through your studies and steps towards a career.
As I mentioned; I have many friends in industry that I can introduce you to, or I can give you advice and critique on your projects or portfolio, or even just some insights into what working life is like for me... I'm only a slack message away!  :speech_balloon:
I am sure you will have tutors at SAE who can also be helping you in this way, but hopefully I can offer another perspective for you to consider? :thinking_face:
